Text: To Homestead Expansion Shippers HOMESTEAD EXPANSION UPDATE Cc I would like to take advantage of this opportunity to update you regarding the Homestead Expansion Precedent Agreements PAs status As I presented in my letter to you last month I expected to be in a position to distribute the PAs this week However that schedule was fairly aggressive and TCO Homestead project team is currently in the process of completing some critical analysis that we need to support our recommendations to TCO management TCO will distribute the PAs as soon as TCO management has reviewed and approves the recommendations made by the Homestead project team At this time I am not expecting any significant delay and remain hopeful that TCO will be able to distribute the PAs during the week ending Friday April I am not superstitious I apologize for any inconvenience this unexpected delay may cause you Please call your account manager or me if you have any questions or special needs related to the Homestead PAs Thank you for your patience and support of this project I look forward to working with you in the near future Best Regards Michael Strauss

To Homestead Expansion Shippers HOMESTEAD EXPANSION UPDATE Cc I would like to take advantage of this opportunity to update you regarding the Homestead Expansion Precedent Agreements PAs status As I presented in my letter to you last month I expected to be in a position to distribute the PAs this week However that schedule was fairly aggressive and TCO Homestead project team is currently in the process of completing some critical analysis that we need to support our recommendations to TCO management TCO will distribute the PAs as soon as TCO management has reviewed and approves the recommendations made by the Homestead project team At this time I am not expecting any significant delay and remain hopeful that TCO will be able to distribute the PAs during the week ending Friday April I am not superstitious I apologize for any inconvenience this unexpected delay may cause you Please call your account manager or me if you have any questions or special needs related to the Homestead PAs Thank you for your patience and support of this project I look forward to working with you in the near future Best Regards Michael Strauss

Homestead Expansion UpdateThe Homestead precedent agreements are going out this week They should be self explanatory but please call your account manager or me with any questions or if you need clarifications Thanks again for your interest in our project Mike
